author: ydshieh
message:
Disable `convert to draft` workflow (#38177)

delete

Co-authored-by: ydshieh <ydshieh@users.noreply.github.com>

files.patch:
@@ -1,25 +0,0 @@
-name: Change PR to draft
-
-on:
-  pull_request_target:
-    types: [opened, reopened]
-
-jobs:
-  convert_pr_to_draft:
-    runs-on: ubuntu-22.04
-    name: Convert PR to draft
-    permissions:
-      pull-requests: write
-      contents: write
-    if: github.event.pull_request.draft == false
-    steps:
-      - name: Convert PR to draft
-        shell: bash
-        env:
-          PR_NUMBER: ${{ github.event.number }}
-          GH_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
-          REPO: ${{ github.repository }}
-        run: |
-          echo $PR_NUMBER
-          gh pr ready $PR_NUMBER --repo $REPO --undo
-          gh pr comment $PR_NUMBER --repo $REPO --body "Hi ðŸ‘‹, thank you for opening this pull request! The pull request is converted to draft by default. The CI will be paused while the PR is in draft mode. When it is ready for review, please click the \`Ready for review\` button (at the bottom of the PR page). This will assign reviewers and trigger CI."
